DOC.detailed_description: Two group people interview research - LTH group control group - total 100 subject . The first group comprise 50 individual , visit otorhinolaryngologist Lithuanian University Health Sciences hospital , regard dysphagia , diagnose LTH endoscopy . The second group consist 50 healthy individual without dysphagia , enlarge lingual tonsil assessment use videolaryngoscopy . All subject fill questionnaire , compose RSI ( Reflux Symptom Index ) DSQ ( Dysphagia Screening Questionnaire ) questionnaires , validate verify use Lithuania , together questionnaire create specifically research gather sociodemographic data . The LTH grade subject determine use DelGaudio Friedman grade system .
